[Home](./index.md) &gt; [promizr](./promizr.md) &gt; [Queue](./promizr.queue.md)

## Queue class

A Queue runs a `worker` function on each item that it contains but limit the number of concurrent runs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default class Queue<T, U> 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(worker, limit, options)](./promizr.queue._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new Queue. |
